section.name: DBC_COD_ACTI
section.code: *<<<< DBC_COD_ACTI *DAD ini 10-FEB-1993 (requerimiento DAP) IF SCR-CMND = 'ICD' AND DBC-COD-ACTI IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-ACTI IN DBE-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-COD-ACTI. *DAD fin 10-FEB-1993 *DAD ini 13-MAY-1992 IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'CL' OR 'EE' OR 'CO' ) AND DBC-COD-ACTI IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES PERFORM ERR-GLS GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-COD-ACTI ELSE IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'PV' OR 'CA' ) AND DBC-COD-ACTI IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-ACTI IN DBE-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-COD-ACTI. *DAD fin 13-MAY-1992 *>>>>

section.name: DBC_COD_CATE AND PGM_ARG
section.code: *<<<< DBC_COD_CATE AND PGM_ARG *VAL-COD Valida codigo de tabla MOVE 'TAB' TO TAB-COD-SIST. MOVE 'SIV ' TO TAB-COD-TTAB IN TAB. MOVE DBC-COD-CATE IN DBE-FLD TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB. PERFORM VAL-COD. *>>>>

section.name: DBC_COD_EJEC
section.code: *<<<< DBC_COD_EJEC *DAD ini 13-MAY-1992 IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'CL' OR 'EE' OR 'CO' OR 'CA' ) AND DBC-COD-EJEC IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES PERFORM ERR-GLS GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-COD-EJEC ELSE IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'PV' ) AND DBC-COD-EJEC IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-EJEC IN DBE-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-COD-EJEC. * IF SCR-CMND = 'ICD' AND DBC-COD-EJEC IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES * MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-EJEC IN DBE-FLD * GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-COD-EJEC. *DAD fin 13-MAY-1992 *>>>>

section.name: DBC_COD_ODSE
section.code: *<<<< DBC_COD_ODSE *DAD ini 13-MAY-1992 IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'CL' OR 'EE' OR 'CO' OR 'CA' ) AND DBC-COD-ODSE IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES PERFORM ERR-GLS GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-COD-ODSE ELSE IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'PV' ) AND DBC-COD-ODSE IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-ODSE IN DBE-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-COD-ODSE. * IF SCR-CMND = 'ICD' AND DBC-COD-ODSE IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES * MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-ODSE IN DBE-FLD * GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-COD-ODSE. *DAD fin 13-MAY-1992 *>>>>

section.name: DBC_COD_OFIC
section.code: *<<<< DBC_COD_OFIC *DAD ini 13-MAY-1992 IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'CL' OR 'EE' OR 'CO' OR 'PV' OR 'CA' ) AND DBC-COD-OFIC IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES PERFORM ERR-GLS GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-COD-OFIC. * IF SCR-CMND = 'ICD' AND DBC-COD-OFIC IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES * MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-OFIC IN DBE-FLD * GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-COD-OFIC. *DAD fin 13-MAY-1992 *>>>>

section.name: DBC_COD_TICL
section.code: *<<<< DBC_COD_TICL *DAD ini 13-MAY-1992 IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'CL' OR 'EE' OR 'CO' OR 'PV' OR 'CA' OR 'EX' ) AND DBC-COD-TICL IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES PERFORM ERR-GLS GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-COD-TICL. * IF SCR-CMND = 'ICD' AND DBC-COD-TICL IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES * MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-TICL IN DBE-FLD * GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-COD-TICL. *DAD fin 13-MAY-1992 *>>>>

section.name: DBC_GLS_NOMC
section.code: *<<<< DBC_GLS_NOMC IF DBC-GLS-NOMC IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES AND SCR-INST = SCR-INST-GFL PERFORM ERR-GLS. *>>>>

section.name: DBC_IND_OOFI
section.code: *<<<< DBC_IND_OOFI

section.name: DBC_IND_OOFI AND NOT PGM_PER
section.code: *DAD ini 10-FEB-1993 (requerimiento DAP) IF SCR-CMND = 'ICD' AND DBC-IND-OOFI IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-IND-OOFI. *DAD fin 10-FEB-1993

section.name: DBC_IND_OOFI AND PGM_PER
section.code: IF SCR-CMND = 'ICD' AND DBC-IND-OOFI IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-IND-OOFI.

section.name: DBC_IND_OOFI$1
section.code: *DAD ini 13-MAY-1992 IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'CL' OR 'EE' OR 'CO' ) AND DBC-IND-OOFI IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES PERFORM ERR-GLS GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-IND-OOFI ELSE IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'PV' OR 'CA' ) AND DBC-IND-OOFI IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-IND-OOFI. *DAD fin 13-MAY-1992

section.name: DBC_NUM_DCOR
section.code: *<<<< DBC_NUM_DCOR

section.name: DBC_NUM_DCOR AND PGM_BCI OR PGM_ARG
section.code: *DAD ini 13-MAY-1992 * IF DBC-NUM-DCOR-ATR IN DBE-FLD = FRM-CPIM-AEY IF FRM-IND-VERS IN DBE-FLD = 'N' MOVE ZEROES TO DBC-NUM-DCOR IN DBE-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-NUM-DCOR. *DAD fin 13-MAY-1992

section.name: DBC_NUM_DCOR$1
section.code: IF SCR-CMND = 'ICD' AND DBC-NUM-DCOR IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-NUM-DCOR. IF SCR-CCPP = 'MOD' OR ( SCR-CCPP = 'ACT' AND SCR-ACTU = SCR-ACTU-MOD ) MOVE DBC-CAI-ICLI IN DBE-FLD TO RCD-CAI-ICLI IN RCD MOVE DBC-IIC-ICLI IN DBE-FLD TO RCD-IIC-ICLI IN RCD MOVE DBC-NUM-DCOR IN DBE-FLD TO RCD-NUM-DIRE IN RCD MOVE FIO-GET-KEY TO FIO-CMND PERFORM SGC-FIO-RCD IF NOT FIO-STAT-OKS MOVE 'SGC' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'NUMDCORNEX ' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-NUM-DCOR. *>>>>

section.name: DBC_NUM_ICLI AND PGM_PER
section.code: *<<<< DBC_NUM_ICLI AND PGM_PER IF DBC-IND-ICLI IN DBE-FLD = '7' AND SCR-CCPP = 'ING' IF DBC-NUM-ICLI IN DBE-FLD = ZEROES MOVE 'CLIA' TO CIC-CAI-ICIC IN CIC MOVE CIC-GET TO CIC-CMND PERFORM PRO-CIC IF CIC-STAT NOT = CIC-STAT-OKS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR MOVE CIC-MENS TO FRM-MENS ELSE MOVE CIC-NUM-ICIC TO DBC-NUM-ICLI IN DBE-FLD MOVE CIC-CAI-ICIC TO SCR-CAI-ICLI MOVE CIC-IIC-ICIC TO SCR-IIC-ICLI ELSE MOVE SPACES TO SCR-CAI-ICLI MOVE ZEROES TO SCR-IIC-ICLI ELSE MOVE SPACES TO SCR-CAI-ICLI MOVE ZEROES TO SCR-IIC-ICLI. *>>>>

section.name: DBC_VRF_ICLI
section.code: *<<<< DBC_VRF_ICLI IF SCR-CMND = 'MIC' AND SCR-INST = SCR-INST-GFL PERFORM KEY-DBC-DBE MOVE 'DBC-IDC-ICLI' TO FIO-AKEY MOVE FIO-GET-KEY TO FIO-CMND PERFORM SGC-FIO-DBC IF FIO-STAT-OKS MOVE 'SGC' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'DBCIDCYAEX' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-VRF-ICLI. *>>>>

section.name: DCE_COD_TBAN
section.code: *<<<< DCE_COD_TBAN *DAD ini 10-FEB-1993 (requerimiento DAP) IF SCR-CMND = 'ICD' AND DCE-COD-TBAN IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-TBAN IN DBE-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-DCE-COD-TBAN. *DAD fin 10-FEB-1993 *DAD ini 26-AUG-1992 IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'CL' ) AND DCE-COD-TBAN IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES PERFORM ERR-GLS GO TO FIN-VAL-DCE-COD-TBAN. *DAD fin 26-AUG-1992 *DAD ini 09-FEB-1994 / 26-JUL-1993 * IF DCE-COD-TBAN IN DBE-FLD = 'P' AND MOVE DCE-COD-TBAN IN DBE-FLD TO WSS-COD-TBAN IN WSS-VARI. IF VAL-TBAN AND *DAD fin 09-FEB-1994 DBC-NUM-ICLI IN DBE-FLD NOT < WSS-NUM-MRUT IN WSS-VARI MOVE 'SGC' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'CODTBANNORUT' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-TBAN IN DBE-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-DCE-COD-TBAN. *DAD fin 26-JUL-1993 *>>>>

section.name: DCE_COD_TPLN
section.code: *<<<< DCE_COD_TPLN *DAD ini 18-FEB-1994 * IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'CL' ) AND * IF DCE-COD-TPLN IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES * PERFORM ERR-GLS * GO TO FIN-VAL-DCE-COD-TPLN. *DAD fin 18-FEB-1994 *>>>>

section.name: DCE_COD_TSOC AND PGM_CHI OR DCE_COD_TSOC AND PGM_ARG
section.code: *<<<< DCE_COD_TSOC AND (PGM_CHI OR PGM_ARG) *DAD ini 05-JUN-1992 IF SCR-CMND NOT = 'MNJ'

section.name: DCE_COD_TSOC AND PGM_CHI OR DCE_COD_TSOC AND PGM_ARG AND PGM_ARG
section.code: AND SCR-CMND NOT = 'ING' AND SCR-CMND NOT = 'INC'

section.name: DCE_COD_TSOC AND PGM_CHI OR DCE_COD_TSOC AND PGM_ARG$1
section.code: GO TO FIN-VAL-DCE-COD-TSOC. *DAD fin 05-JUN-1992 *>>>>

section.name: DCE_FEC_FCAD
section.code: *<<<< DCE_FEC_FCAD IF SCR-CMND = 'ICD' AND DCE-FEC-FCAD IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES GO TO FIN-VAL-DCE-FEC-FCAD. *>>>>

section.name: DCE_FEC_FCTT
section.code: *<<<< DCE_FEC_FCTT IF SCR-CMND = 'ICD' AND DCE-FEC-FCTT IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES GO TO FIN-VAL-DCE-FEC-FCTT. *>>>>

section.name: DCE_FEC_FUME
section.code: *<<<< DCE_FEC_FUME IF SCR-CMND = 'ICD' AND DCE-FEC-FUME IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES GO TO FIN-VAL-DCE-FEC-FUME. *>>>>

section.name: DCE_IND_CATE
section.code: *<<<< DCE_IND_CATE

section.name: DCE_IND_CATE AND NOT PGM_PER
section.code: *DAD ini 10-FEB-1993 (requerimiento DAP) IF SCR-CMND = 'ICD' AND DCE-IND-CATE IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-CATE IN DBE-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-DCE-IND-CATE. *DAD fin 10-FEB-1993

section.name: DCE_IND_CATE AND PGM_PER
section.code: IF SCR-CMND = 'ICD' AND DCE-IND-CATE IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-CATE IN DBE-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-DCE-IND-CATE.

section.name: DCE_IND_CATE$1
section.code: *DAD ini 13-MAY-1992 IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'CL' OR 'EE' OR 'CO' ) AND DCE-IND-CATE IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES PERFORM ERR-GLS GO TO FIN-VAL-DCE-IND-CATE ELSE IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'PV' OR 'CA' ) AND DCE-IND-CATE IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-CATE IN DBE-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-DCE-IND-CATE. *DAD fin 13-MAY-1992

section.name: DCE_IND_CMOS
section.code: *<<<< DCE_IND_CMOS

section.name: DCE_IND_CMOS AND NOT PGM_PER
section.code: *DAD ini 10-FEB-1993 (requerimiento DAP) IF SCR-CMND = 'ICD' AND DCE-IND-CMOS IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES GO TO FIN-VAL-DCE-IND-CMOS. *DAD fin 10-FEB-1993

section.name: DCE_IND_CMOS AND PGM_PER
section.code: IF SCR-CMND = 'ICD' AND DCE-IND-CMOS IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES GO TO FIN-VAL-DCE-IND-CMOS.

section.name: DCE_IND_CMOS$1
section.code: *DAD ini 13-MAY-1992 IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'CL' OR 'EE' ) AND DCE-IND-CMOS IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES PERFORM ERR-GLS GO TO FIN-VAL-DCE-IND-CMOS ELSE IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'PV' OR 'CO' OR 'CA' ) AND DCE-IND-CMOS IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES GO TO FIN-VAL-DCE-IND-CMOS. *DAD fin 13-MAY-1992

section.name: DCE_IND_RAUT
section.code: *<<<< DCE_IND_RAUT IF SCR-CMND = 'ICD' AND DCE-IND-RAUT IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES GO TO FIN-VAL-DCE-IND-RAUT. *>>>>

section.name: DCE_IND_TEMP
section.code: *<<<< DCE_IND_TEMP

section.name: DCE_IND_TEMP AND NOT PGM_PER
section.code: *DAD ini 10-FEB-1993 (requerimiento DAP) IF SCR-CMND = 'ICD' AND DCE-IND-TEMP IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES GO TO FIN-VAL-DCE-IND-TEMP. *DAD fin 10-FEB-1993

section.name: DCE_IND_TEMP AND PGM_PER
section.code: IF SCR-CMND = 'ICD' AND DCE-IND-TEMP IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES GO TO FIN-VAL-DCE-IND-TEMP.

section.name: DCE_IND_TEMP$1
section.code: *DAD ini 13-MAY-1992 IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'CL' OR 'EE' OR 'CO' ) AND DCE-IND-TEMP IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES PERFORM ERR-GLS GO TO FIN-VAL-DCE-IND-TEMP ELSE IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'PV' OR 'CA' ) AND DCE-IND-TEMP IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES GO TO FIN-VAL-DCE-IND-TEMP. *DAD fin 13-MAY-1992

section.name: EOF
section.code: *<<<< EOF *DAD ini 05-JUN-1992 CHK-NUM-FONO SECTION. INI-CHK-NUM-FONO. IF WSS-NUM-FONO IN WSS-VARI(WSS-IND) = SPACES IF WSS-IND-STAT IN WSS-VARI = 'A' OR 'E' NEXT SENTENCE ELSE IF WSS-IND-STAT IN WSS-VARI = 'B' OR 'D' MOVE 'E' TO WSS-IND-STAT IN WSS-VARI ELSE * IF WSS-IND-STAT IN WSS-VARI = 'C' MOVE 'X' TO WSS-IND-STAT IN WSS-VARI ELSE IF WSS-NUM-FONO IN WSS-VARI(WSS-IND) = '-' IF WSS-IND-STAT IN WSS-VARI = 'A' OR 'C' OR 'D' OR 'E' MOVE 'X' TO WSS-IND-STAT IN WSS-VARI ELSE * IF WSS-IND-STAT IN WSS-VARI = 'B' MOVE 'C' TO WSS-IND-STAT IN WSS-VARI ELSE IF WSS-NUM-FONO IN WSS-VARI(WSS-IND) IS NUMERIC IF WSS-IND-STAT IN WSS-VARI = 'A' MOVE 'B' TO WSS-IND-STAT IN WSS-VARI ELSE IF WSS-IND-STAT IN WSS-VARI = 'B' OR 'D' NEXT SENTENCE ELSE IF WSS-IND-STAT IN WSS-VARI = 'C' MOVE 'D' TO WSS-IND-STAT IN WSS-VARI ELSE * IF WSS-IND-STAT IN WSS-VARI = 'E' MOVE 'X' TO WSS-IND-STAT IN WSS-VARI ELSE MOVE 'X' TO WSS-IND-STAT IN WSS-VARI. FIN-CHK-NUM-FONO. EXIT. *DAD fin 05-JUN-1992 *>>>>

section.name: FIN_DBC_MSC_SCLI AND PGM_ARG
section.code: *<<<< FIN_DBC_MSC_SCLI IF MSG-COD-MENS = 'COD NEX' OR DBC-MSC-SCLI IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-SCLI IN DBE-FLD ELSE MOVE MSC-GLS-DESC IN MSC TO FRM-GLS-SCLI IN DBE-FLD. *>>>>

section.name: FIN_PUT_ALL_DBE
section.code: *<<<< FIN_PUT_ALL_DBE

section.name: FIN_PUT_ALL_DBE AND NOT PGM_PER
section.code: *DAD ini 09-FEB-1994 * IF RCD-COD-LUGA IN DBE-FLD > SPACES * MOVE RCD-COD-LUGA IN DBE-FLD TO WSS-COD-LUGA * IF WSS-IND-PAIS = 'P' * MOVE 'TAB' TO TAB-COD-SIST * MOVE 'PAI' TO TAB-COD-TTAB IN TAB * MOVE WSS-COD-PAIS TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB * PERFORM BUS-TAB * MOVE TAB-GLS-DESC IN TAB TO FRM-GLS-LUGA IN DBE-FLD * ELSE * MOVE 'TAB' TO TAB-COD-SIST * MOVE 'COM' TO TAB-COD-TTAB IN TAB * MOVE RCD-COD-LUGA IN DBE-FLD TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB * PERFORM BUS-TAB * MOVE TAB-GLS-DESC IN TAB TO FRM-GLS-LUGA IN DBE-FLD. *DAD fin 09-FEB-1994

section.name: FIN_PUT_ALL_DBE AND NOT PGM_PER$1
section.code: GO TO FIN-GET-FRM-IND-ERCC.

section.name: FIN_PUT_ALL_DBE AND NOT PGM_PER$2
section.code: FIN-GET-FRM-IND-ERCC. EXIT.

section.name: FIN_PUT_ALL_DBE AND PGM_PER
section.code: GO TO GET-FRM-GLS-RBCO.

section.name: FIN_PUT_ALL_DBE$1
section.code: GET-FRM-IND-ERCC. MOVE SPACES TO REC-KEY-IREC IN REC. MOVE DBC-CAI-ICLI IN DBE-FLD TO REC-CAI-ICLI IN REC. MOVE DBC-IIC-ICLI IN DBE-FLD TO REC-IIC-ICLI IN REC. MOVE FIO-GET-NLS TO FIO-CMND. LUP-GET-FRM-IND-ERCC. PERFORM SGC-FIO-REC. IF NOT FIO-STAT-OKS MOVE 'N' TO FRM-IND-ERCC IN DBE-FLD

section.name: FIN_PUT_ALL_DBE$2
section.code: IF REC-CAI-ICLI IN REC = DBC-CAI-ICLI IN DBE-FLD AND REC-IIC-ICLI IN REC = DBC-IIC-ICLI IN DBE-FLD IF REC-IND-VIGE IN REC = 'N' OR REC-COD-TREC IN REC = REC-COD-RBCO MOVE FIO-GET-NXT TO FIO-CMND GO TO LUP-GET-FRM-IND-ERCC ELSE MOVE 'S' TO FRM-IND-ERCC IN DBE-FLD ELSE MOVE 'N' TO FRM-IND-ERCC IN DBE-FLD.

section.name: FIN_PUT_ALL_DBE$3
section.code: GET-FRM-GLS-RBCO. PERFORM BUS-PPU. IF MSG-COD-MENS > SPACES MOVE MSG-GLS-DCOR TO FRM-GLS-RBCO IN DBE-FLD ELSE PERFORM CIC-PPU IF MSG-COD-MENS > SPACES MOVE MSG-GLS-DCOR TO FRM-GLS-RBCO IN DBE-FLD ELSE MOVE DBC-CAI-ICLI IN DBE-FLD TO PPU-CAI-ICLI MOVE DBC-IIC-ICLI IN DBE-FLD TO PPU-IIC-ICLI PERFORM BUS-RCU MOVE TAB-GLS-DCOR IN TAB TO FRM-GLS-RBCO IN DBE-FLD. *>>>>

section.name: FIN_PUT_DBC_DBE AND PGM_BCI OR PGM_ARG
section.code: *<<<< FIN_PUT_DBC_DBE *DAD ini 26-JUN-1992 IF FRM-IND-VERS IN DBE-FLD = 'N' MOVE ZEROES TO DBC-NUM-DCOR IN DBE-FLD. *DAD fin 26-JUN-1992

section.name: FIN_PUT_DBC_DBE AND PGM_BCI OR PGM_ARG AND PGM_ARG
section.code: *RDA INI 14-02-94 IF DBC-MSC-SCLI IN DBE-FLD > SPACES MOVE 'SGC' TO MSC-COD-SIST MOVE 'SCLI' TO MSC-COD-TMSC IN MSC MOVE DBC-MSC-SCLI IN DBE-FLD TO MSC-COD-CMSC IN MSC PERFORM BUS-MSC MOVE MSC-GLS-DESC IN MSC TO FRM-GLS-SCLI IN DBE-FLD. *RDA FIN 14-02-94

section.name: INI_DBC_MSC_SCLI AND PGM_ARG
section.code: *<<<< INI_DBC_MSC_SCLI IF DBC-MSC-SCLI IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES PERFORM ERR-GLS MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-SCLI IN DBE-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-MSC-SCLI. *>>>>

section.name: INI_DCE_COD_TSOC AND PGM_ARG
section.code: *<<<< INI_DCE_COD_TSOC AND PGM_ARG IF DCE-COD-TSOC IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES PERFORM ERR-GLS MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-TSOC IN DBE-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-DCE-COD-TSOC. *>>>>

section.name: INI_PUT_ALL_DBE AND PGM_ARG
section.code: *<<<< INI_PUT_ALL_DBE MOVE DBC-KEY-IDBC IN DBC TO DCE-KEY-IDCE IN DCE. MOVE DBC-KEY-IDBC IN DBC TO RCD-KEY-IRCD IN RCD. PERFORM BUS-DOM. IF RCD-GLS-DIRE IN RCD NOT > SPACES MOVE 01 TO RCD-NUM-DIRE IN RCD. MOVE DBC-CIC-ICLI IN DBC TO RCD-CIC-ICLI IN RCD. MOVE DBC-STP-ITRN IN DBC TO SCR-UMOD. MOVE FIO-GET-KEY TO FIO-CMND. PERFORM SGC-FIO-DCE. MOVE FIO-STAT TO PGM-STAT-DCE. IF FIO-STAT-OKS MOVE FIO-GET-KEY TO FIO-CMND PERFORM SGC-FIO-RCD MOVE FIO-STAT TO PGM-STAT-RCD. *>>>>

section.name: INI_PUT_DBC_DBE AND PGM_CHI OR INI_PUT_DBC_DBE AND PGM_ARG
section.code: *<<<< INI_PUT_DBC_DBE AND (PGM_CHI OR PGM_ARG) *DAD ini 26-JUN-1992 MOVE 'SGC' TO FIO-SIST. MOVE 'VSN' TO TAB-COD-TTAB IN TAB. MOVE 'DBCDCOR DBE' TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB. MOVE FIO-GET-KEY TO FIO-CMND. PERFORM GNS-FIO-TAB. IF NOT ( FIO-STAT-OKS AND TAB-MSC-STAT IN TAB = 'S' ) * MOVE FRM-CPIM-AEY TO DBC-NUM-DCOR-ATR IN DBE-FLD * MOVE ZEROES TO DBC-NUM-DCOR IN DBE-FLD MOVE 'N' TO FRM-IND-VERS IN DBE-FLD ELSE MOVE 'S' TO FRM-IND-VERS IN DBE-FLD MOVE TAB-GLS-DCOR IN TAB TO FRM-GLS-DCOR IN DBE-FLD. *DAD fin 26-JUN-1992 *>>>>

section.name: INI_VAL_CON_KEY_DBE
section.code: *<<<< INI_VAL_CON_KEY_DBE IF FRM-FFLD = FRM-FFLD-PF7 OR FRM-FFLD-PF8 GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-KEY-DBE. *>>>>

section.name: INI_VAL_FLD_DBE
section.code:
*<<<< INI_VAL_FLD_DBE *Este label al 15-NOV-1989 no existia, por lo se debe incorporar al *SGCBMDBE.SRCAIU *DAD 12-SEP-1990 19:40:16 IF SCR-CMND = 'MNC' GO TO FIN-VAL-FLD-DBE.
IF SCR-CMND = 'MIC' PERFORM VAL-IKY-DBE GO TO FIN-VAL-FLD-DBE.
IF SCR-CMND = 'INC'

section.name: INI_VAL_FLD_DBE AND PGM_ARG
section.code: PERFORM VAL-DCE-COD-TSOC IF FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-MAL OR FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-CLR MOVE -1 TO DCE-COD-TSOC-LEN IN DBE-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-FLD-DBE ELSE

section.name: INI_VAL_FLD_DBE AND PGM_CHI OR PGM_ARG
section.code: OR DBC-IND-ICLI IN DBE-FLD = 'A'

section.name: INI_VAL_FLD_DBE AND PGM_PER
section.code: MOVE ZEROES TO DCE-FEC-FCTT IN DBE-FLD MOVE ZEROES TO DCE-FEC-FUME IN DBE-FLD MOVE ZEROES TO DCE-FEC-FCAD IN DBE-FLD MOVE ZEROES TO DBC-FEC-FTRN IN DBE-FLD

section.name: INI_VAL_FLD_DBE$1
section.code: PERFORM VAL-MKY-DBE IF SCR-CMND = 'INC'

section.name: INI_VAL_FLD_DBE$2
section.code: IF DBC-COD-OFIC IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES PERFORM ERR-GLS MOVE -1 TO DBC-COD-OFIC-LEN IN DBE-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-FLD-DBE ELSE PERFORM VAL-DBC-COD-OFIC IF FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-MAL OR FRM-SUAR = FRM-SUAR-CLR MOVE -1 TO DBC-COD-OFIC-LEN IN DBE-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-FLD-DBE ELSE

section.name: INI_VAL_FLD_DBE$3
section.code:
GO TO FIN-VAL-FLD-DBE ELSE GO TO FIN-VAL-FLD-DBE.
*DAD ini 13-MAY-1992 MOVE 'SGC' TO FIO-SIST. MOVE 'TCL' TO TAB-COD-TTAB. MOVE DBC-COD-TICL IN DBE-FLD TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB. MOVE FIO-GET-KEY TO FIO-CMND. PERFORM GNS-FIO-TAB. IF FIO-STAT-OKS MOVE TAB-CIC-CTAB IN TAB TO WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI ELSE MOVE SPACES TO WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI. *DAD fin 13-MAY-1992 *>>>>

section.name: PGM_PER AND DBC_NUM_DCOR
section.code: *<<<< DBC_NUM_DCOR IF DBC-NUM-DCOR IN DBE-FLD NOT > ZEROES AND SCR-CMND = 'DEP' GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-NUM-DCOR. *>>>>

section.name: PGM_PER AND INI_DBC_COD_ACTI
section.code: *<<<< INI_DBC_COD_ACTI IF DBC-COD-ACTI IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES AND SCR-CMND = 'DEP' MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-ACTI IN DBE-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-COD-ACTI. *>>>>

section.name: PGM_PER AND INI_DBC_COD_EJEC
section.code: *<<<< INI_DBC_COD_EJEC IF DBC-COD-EJEC IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES IF SCR-CMND = 'DEP' MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-EJEC IN DBE-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-COD-EJEC ELSE PERFORM ERR-GLS GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-COD-EJEC. *>>>>

section.name: PGM_PER AND INI_DBC_COD_ODSE
section.code: *<<<< INI_DBC_COD_ODSE IF DBC-COD-ODSE IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES AND SCR-CMND = 'DEP' MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-ODSE IN DBE-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-COD-ODSE. *>>>>

section.name: PGM_PER AND INI_DBC_COD_OFIC
section.code: *<<<< INI_DBC_COD_OFIC IF DBC-COD-OFIC IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES AND SCR-CMND = 'DEP' MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-OFIC IN DBE-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-COD-OFIC. *>>>>

section.name: PGM_PER AND INI_DBC_COD_TICL
section.code: *<<<< INI_DBC_COD_TICL IF DBC-COD-TICL IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES AND SCR-CMND = 'DEP' MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-TICL IN DBE-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-COD-TICL. *>>>>

section.name: PGM_PER AND INI_DBC_IND_ICLI
section.code: *<<<< INI_DBC_IND_ICLI IF SCR-CCPP = 'ING' MOVE IDC-BLCO-N TO IDC-BLCO. MOVE IDC-TCLI-EMP TO IDC-TCLI. *>>>>

section.name: PGM_PER AND INI_DBC_IND_MEMP
section.code: *<<<< INI_DBC_IND_MEMP IF DBC-IND-MEMP IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES AND SCR-CMND = 'DEP' GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-IND-MEMP. *>>>>

section.name: PGM_PER AND INI_DBC_IND_OOFI
section.code: *<<<< INI_DBC_IND_OOFI IF DBC-IND-OOFI IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES AND SCR-CMND = 'DEP' GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-IND-OOFI. *>>>>

section.name: PGM_PER AND INI_DBC_IND_RESI
section.code: *<<<< INI_DBC_IND_RESI IF DBC-IND-RESI IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES AND SCR-CMND = 'DEP' GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-IND-RESI. *>>>>

section.name: PGM_PER AND INI_DCE_COD_TSOC
section.code: *<<<< INI_DCE_COD_TSOC IF DCE-COD-TSOC IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES AND SCR-CMND = 'DEP' GO TO FIN-VAL-DCE-COD-TSOC. *>>>>

section.name: PGM_PER AND INI_DCE_FEC_FCTT
section.code: *<<<< INI_DCE_FEC_FCTT IF DCE-FEC-FCTT IN DBE-FLD NOT > ZEROES AND SCR-CMND = 'DEP' MOVE ZEROES TO DCE-FEC-FCTT IN DBE-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-DCE-FEC-FCTT. *>>>>

section.name: PGM_PER AND INI_DCE_IND_CATE
section.code: *<<<< INI_DCE_IND_CATE IF DCE-IND-CATE IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES AND SCR-CMND = 'DEP' MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-CATE IN DBE-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-DCE-IND-CATE. *>>>>

section.name: PGM_PER AND INI_DCE_IND_CMOS
section.code: *<<<< INI_DCE_IND_CMOS IF DCE-IND-CMOS IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES AND SCR-CMND = 'DEP' GO TO FIN-VAL-DCE-IND-CMOS. *>>>>

section.name: PGM_PER AND INI_DCE_IND_TEMP
section.code: *<<<< INI_DCE_IND_TEMP IF DCE-IND-TEMP IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES AND SCR-CMND = 'DEP' GO TO FIN-VAL-DCE-IND-TEMP. *>>>>

section.name: PGM_PER AND INI_RCD_COD_LUGA
section.code: *<<<< INI_RCD_COD_LUGA IF RCD-COD-LUGA IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES AND SCR-CMND = 'DEP' MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-LUGA IN DBE-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-RCD-COD-LUGA. *>>>>

section.name: PGM_PER AND RCD_GLS_DIRE
section.code: *<<<< RCD_GLS_DIRE IF RCD-GLS-DIRE IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES AND SCR-CMND = 'DEP' GO TO FIN-VAL-RCD-GLS-DIRE. *>>>>

section.name: PGM_PER AND RCD_GLS_FONO
section.code: *<<<< RCD_GLS_FONO IF RCD-GLS-FONO IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES AND SCR-CMND = 'DEP' GO TO FIN-VAL-RCD-GLS-FONO. *>>>>

section.name: RCD_COD_LUGA
section.code:
*<<<< RCD_COD_LUGA *DAD ini 13-MAY-1992 IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'PV' OR ' ' ) AND RCD-COD-LUGA IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-LUGA IN DBE-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-RCD-COD-LUGA.
IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'CL' OR 'EE' OR 'CO' OR 'CA' ) AND RCD-COD-LUGA IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES PERFORM ERR-GLS GO TO FIN-VAL-RCD-COD-LUGA. *DAD fin 13-MAY-1992

section.name: RCD_COD_LUGA AND NOT PGM_PER
section.code: *DAD ini 09-FEB-1994 * MOVE RCD-COD-LUGA IN DBE-FLD TO WSS-COD-LUGA. * IF WSS-IND-PAIS = 'P' * MOVE 'TAB' TO TAB-COD-SIST * MOVE 'PAI' TO TAB-COD-TTAB IN TAB * MOVE WSS-COD-PAIS TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB * PERFORM VAL-COD * IF MSG-COD-MENS IN MSG NOT = 'COD NEX' AND * RCD-COD-LUGA IN DBE-FLD > SPACES * MOVE TAB-GLS-DESC IN TAB TO FRM-GLS-LUGA IN DBE-FLD * ELSE * MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-LUGA IN DBE-FLD * ELSE * MOVE 'TAB' TO TAB-COD-SIST * MOVE 'COM' TO TAB-COD-TTAB IN TAB * MOVE RCD-COD-LUGA IN DBE-FLD TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB * PERFORM VAL-COD * IF MSG-COD-MENS IN MSG NOT = 'COD NEX' AND * RCD-COD-LUGA IN DBE-FLD > SPACES * MOVE TAB-GLS-DESC IN TAB TO FRM-GLS-LUGA IN DBE-FLD * ELSE * MOVE SPACES TO FRM-GLS-LUGA IN DBE-FLD. *DAD fin 09-FEB-1994

section.name: RCD_GLS_DIRE
section.code: *<<<< RCD_GLS_DIRE *DAD ini 13-MAY-1992 IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'PV' OR ' ' ) AND RCD-GLS-DIRE IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES GO TO FIN-VAL-RCD-GLS-DIRE. *DAD fin 13-MAY-1992 IF RCD-GLS-DIRE IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES PERFORM ERR-GLS. *>>>>

section.name: RCD_GLS_FONO
section.code: *<<<< RCD_GLS_FONO *DAD ini 13-MAY-1992 IF ( WSS-CIC-TICL IN WSS-VARI = 'CL' OR 'EE' OR 'CO' OR 'CA' ) AND RCD-GLS-FONO IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES PERFORM ERR-GLS GO TO FIN-VAL-RCD-GLS-FONO. * IF SCR-CMND = 'ICD' AND RCD-GLS-FONO IN DBE-FLD NOT > SPACES * GO TO FIN-VAL-RCD-GLS-FONO. *DAD fin 13-MAY-1992 *DAD ini 05-JUN-1992 MOVE 'A' TO WSS-IND-STAT IN WSS-VARI. IF RCD-GLS-FONO IN DBE-FLD NOT NUMERIC MOVE RCD-GLS-FONO IN DBE-FLD TO WSS-GLS-FONO IN WSS-VARI PERFORM CHK-NUM-FONO VARYING WSS-IND FROM 1 BY 1 UNTIL WSS-IND > 12 OR WSS-IND-STAT IN WSS-VARI = 'X'. IF WSS-IND-STAT IN WSS-VARI = 'X' OR 'C' MOVE 'SGC' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'NUMFONOERROR' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-RCD-GLS-FONO. *DAD fin 05-JUN-1992 *>>>>
